mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.MDCD AS MILDSC , DECODE(A.MDCD , 'A', '국방부' , 'B', '육군' , 'C', '해군' , 'D', '공군') AS MILDSC_NM , DEPT_CD , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM , (SELECT B.whl_dept_nm FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS FULL_DEPT_NM , TELNO , A.RANK_NM AS RANK , A.FULNM AS NM , A.rsponm AS RSPOFC_NM , A.rspsblt_biznes_nm AS RSPSBLT_BIZNES , MPNO , ROWNUM AS rnum FROM TBL_USER_n A WHERE 1=1 AND MDCD = #{mildsc} AND DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} AND ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ORDER BY DEPT_CD, rspofc_nm) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} ORDER BY SUBSTR(telno,12,1) asc;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mdcd AS MILDSC , DECODE(MDCD , 'A', '국방부' , 'B', '육군' , 'C', '해군' , 'D', '공군') AS MILDSC_NM , DEPT_CD , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM , (SELECT B.whl_dept_nm FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS FULL_DEPT_NM , instla_nm AS facility_nm , telno AS TEL , ROWNUM AS rnum FROM TBL_facility_n A WHERE 1=1 AND mdcd = #{mildsc} AND DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} AND ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ORDER BY DEPT_CD) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum}

SELECT C.SEQ , C.MDCD AS MILDSC , DECODE(C.MDCD , 'A', '국방부' , 'B', '육군' , 'C', '해군' , 'D', '공군') AS MILDSC_NM , C.DEPT_CD , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM , C.FULNM AS NM , C.SRVNO AS MIL_NO , C.RSPSBLT_BIZNES_NM AS RSPSBLT_BIZNES , C.RANK_NM AS RANK , C.RSPONM AS RSPOFC_NM , C.TELNO , C.MPNO , C.OPNPBL_YN , C.USER_EXSTNC_EXNEX AS STATE FROM TBL_USER_N C WHERE 1=1
AND C.TELNO like '%' || #{telno} || '%'
AND C.MPNO like '%' || #{mpno} || '%'
AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT ID , FULNM AS NM , DEPT_CD , SRVNO AS MIL_NO , RSPSBLT_BIZNES_NM AS RSPSBLT_BIZNES , RANK_NM AS RANK , RSPONM AS RSPOFC_NM , TELNO , MPNO , EMAIL FROM TBL_USER_N WHERE 1=1 AND MDCD = #{mildsc} AND DEPT_CD = #{hgrnkDeptCd}

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ , BLTNBD_CD AS BOARD_CD , TITLE , CTNT AS CONTENT , OPNPBL_YN AS STATE , INQRY_NMBR AS CNT , TO_CHAR(rgst_dttm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DT , RGST_ID AS REG_ID , RGST_MDCD AS REG_MILDSC , MDFC_DTTM AS UPT_DT , MDFC_ID AS UPT_ID , MDFC_MDCD AS UPT_MILDSC , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_board_atch A WHERE A.tbl_pk = FILEATCH_NUM) AS ATCH_CNT FROM TBL_BOARD_N WHERE 1=1 AND BLTNBD_CD = #{boardCd} ORDER BY seq desc ) A WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex}+1 AND #{lastIndex}

SELECT SEQ , BLTNBD_CD AS BOARD_CD , TITLE , CTNT AS CONTENT , OPNPBL_YN AS STATE , INQRY_NMBR AS CNT , TO_CHAR(rgst_dttm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DT , RGST_ID AS REG_ID , RGST_MDCD AS REG_MILDSC , MDFC_DTTM AS UPT_DT , MDFC_ID AS UPT_ID , MDFC_MDCD AS UPT_MILDSC , FILEATCH_NUM FROM TBL_BOARD_N WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq} AND BLTNBD_CD = #{boardCd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD_N WHERE 1=1 AND BLTNBD_CD= #{boardCd}

SELECT ID , TEXT , PARENT , LEVEL_t AS LEVLE FROM ( SELECT DEPT_CD AS ID, DEPT_NM AS TEXT, HGRNK_DEPT_CD AS PARENT , LEVEL AS LEVEL_t FROM TBL_DEPT_N START WITH HGRNK_DEPT_CD = #{hgrnkDeptCd} AND MDCD = #{mildsc} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_CD = HGRNK_DEPT_CD
ORDER SIBLINGS BY SEQC
ORDER SIBLINGS BY DEPT_CD
)
SELECT EMPLOYEE_NAME , LOGIN_ID FROM MA_EMPLOYEE WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{id}
SELECT EMPLOYEE_NAME , LOGIN_ID FROM MA_EMPLOYEE WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{id}
SELECT call_type , employee_id , ani , abandon_time , dialring_time , call_time , target_dn , event_starttime FROM ot_callstat WHERE employee_id = #{id} ORDER BY event_starttime DESC
SELECT call_type , employee_id , ani , abandon_time , dialring_time , call_time , target_dn , event_starttime FROM ot_callstat WHERE employee_id = #{id} ORDER BY event_starttime DESC

SELECT C.SEQ , C.MDCD AS MILDSC , DECODE(C.MDCD , 'A', '국방부' , 'B', '육군' , 'C', '해군' , 'D', '공군') AS MILDSC_NM , C.DEPT_CD , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TBL_DEPT_N B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM , C.FULNM AS NM , C.SRVNO AS MIL_NO , C.RSPSBLT_BIZNES_NM AS RSPSBLT_BIZNES , C.RANK_NM AS RANK , C.RSPONM AS RSPOFC_NM , C.TELNO , C.MPNO , C.OPNPBL_YN , C.USER_EXSTNC_EXNEX AS STATE FROM TBL_USER_N C WHERE 1=1
AND REPLACE(C.TELNO,'-','') like '%' || #{telno} || '%'
AND FULNM like '%' || #{fulnm} || '%'
AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT seq, [type], fulnm, mdcd, servno, dept_cd, dept_nm, full_dept_nm, rank_nm, telno, mpno, strt_date, end_date, rgst_dttm, rgst_rsn, rgst_id, act_type, act_dttm, rtn_rsn, act_id FROM tbl_block_user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_block_user WHERE 1=1 AND mpno = #{ANI} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN strt_date AND end_date
